### 1a. Source UFO encounter data
```{r source, warning = TRUE, results = FALSE, message = FALSE}

   library (tidyverse)
   library (janitor) 

   emperors_raw <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-08-13/emperors.csv") %>%
      clean_names () %>%
      drop_na (birth)
```
   
### 2.  Transform UFO data
```{r source, warning = TRUE, results = FALSE, message = FALSE}
   
   library (lubridate)

   emperors <- emperors_raw %>%
      filter (era == "Principate") %>%
      select (index, name, birth, reign_start, reign_end, rise, cause) %>%
      mutate (
         birth = case_when (
            index %in% c(1,2,4,6) ~ update (birth, year = - year (birth)),
            TRUE~ birth
            ),
        reign_start = case_when (
            index %in% c(1) ~ update (reign_start, year = - year (reign_start)),
            TRUE~ reign_start
            ),
         reign_start_age = (reign_start- birth)/365.25,
         reign_end_age = (reign_end - birth)/365.25,
         cause_new = fct_lump (cause, 4)
      )
```


### 3. Visualize data
```{r plot}

   library (ggdark)

   ggplot( data = emperors) +
      geom_segment(
         aes(y = reign_start_age, x = reorder(name, -reign_end_age), yend = reign_end_age, xend = name),
         alpha = 0.3
         ) +
      geom_point(
         aes(x=name, y=reign_end_age, color = cause_new),
         size = 0.7
         ) +
      coord_flip () +
      dark_mode(theme_minimal()) +
      scale_y_continuous(
            breaks = c(1, 20, 40, 60),
            labels = c("I", "XX", "LIX", "LX")
            ) +
      scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
      theme (
         text = element_text(family = "Trajanus Roman", color = "white"),   #download font from https://www.fontspace.com/roger-white/trajanus-roman
         axis.title.y = element_blank (),
         axis.title.x = element_text (hjust = 1),
         axis.text.x = element_text (size = 8),
         legend.key.size = unit(0.1, 'lines'),
         legend.position = c(0.85,0.65),
         legend.title = element_blank(),
         panel.grid = element_blank (),
         plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 16),
         plot.caption = element_text(hjust = 1, size = 8)
         ) +
      labs(
         title = "Roman Emperors in Principate Era\n",
         caption = "\nSource: Wikipedia    Visualization: Joel Soroos @soroosj",
         y = "Age (Years)"
         ) +
     ggsave("emperors.png", width = 15, height = 20, units = "cm")
      
 
```
